CommentBody:
the cap policy page did not load entirely and the policies were not accessible as the browser timed out.
I optimized the server for their current resources and as a fix for the policies, I enabled widget view, removed all computers/users assigned as entities, and just enabled the department. This was done for all policies and the page now loads and is working.
Recommended they increase the resources which might be done this week or early next week and we can optimize it again.
